definition.annotation:
This workflow is composed with the XCMS tool R package (Smith, C.A. 2006) able to extract, filter, align and fill gapand the possibility to annotate isotopes, adducts and fragments using the CAMERA R package (Kuhl, C 2012).


https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/metabolomics/tutorials/lcms-preprocessing/tutorial.html
definition.name: Mass spectrometry: LC-MS preprocessing with XCMS

readme:
# Mass spectrometry: LC-MS preprocessing with XCMS 

This workflow uses the XCMS tool R package [(Smith, C.A. 2006)](https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/xcms.html) to extract, filter, align and fill gaps, and uses the CAMERA R package [(Kuhl, C 2012)](https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/CAMERA.html) to annotate isotopes, adducts and fragments.

🎓 For more information see the [Galaxy Training Network tutorial: Mass spectrometry: LC-MS preprocessing with XCMS](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/metabolomics/tutorials/lcms-preprocessing/tutorial.html)

## Inputs
### sampleMetadata
The sampleMetadata tabular file corresponds to a table containing information about your samples

A sample metadata file contains various information for each of your raw files:
- Classes which will be used during the preprocessing steps
- Analytical batches which will be useful for a batch correction step, along with sample types (pool/sample) and injection order
- Different experimental conditions which can be used for statistics
- Any information about samples that you want to keep, in a column format

The content of your sample metadata file has to be filled by you, since it is not contained in your raw data. Note that you can either:
- Upload an existing metadata file
- Use a template to create one (because it can be painful to get the sample list without misspelling or omission)
  - Generate a template with the `xcms get a sampleMetadata file` tool available in Galaxy
  - Fill it using your favorite table editor (Excel, LibreOffice)
  - Upload it within Galaxy

**Formats:** tab-separated values as tsv, tab, txt, ...

### Mass-spectrometry Dataset Collection
Mass-spectrometry data files gathered in a Galaxy Dataser Collection

**Formats:** open format as mzXML, mzMl, mzData and netCDF

## Main steps
1. MSnbase readMSData: read the mzXML and prepare for xcms
2. XCMS findChromPeaks: peak picking
3. XCMS groupChromPeaks: determining shared ions across samples
4. XCMS adjustRtime: retention time correction
5. XCMS fillChromPeaks: integrating areas of missing peaks
6. CAMERA.annotate: annotation
changelog:
# Changelog

## [1.1] - 2025-05-05

### Changed
- name of the output was changed to `dataMatrix`

### Automatic update
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/lecorguille/msnbase_readmsdata/msnbase_readmsdata/2.16.1+galaxy2` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/lecorguille/msnbase_readmsdata/msnbase_readmsdata/2.16.1+galaxy3`
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/lecorguille/xcms_plot_chromatogram/xcms_plot_chromatogram/3.12.0+galaxy0` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/lecorguille/xcms_plot_chromatogram/xcms_plot_chromatogram/3.12.0+galaxy3`
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/lecorguille/xcms_xcmsset/abims_xcms_xcmsSet/3.12.0+galaxy0` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/lecorguille/xcms_xcmsset/abims_xcms_xcmsSet/3.12.0+galaxy3`
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/lecorguille/xcms_merge/xcms_merge/3.12.0+galaxy0` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/lecorguille/xcms_merge/xcms_merge/3.12.0+galaxy3`
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/lecorguille/xcms_group/abims_xcms_group/3.12.0+galaxy0` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/lecorguille/xcms_group/abims_xcms_group/3.12.0+galaxy3`
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/lecorguille/xcms_retcor/abims_xcms_retcor/3.12.0+galaxy0` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/lecorguille/xcms_retcor/abims_xcms_retcor/3.12.0+galaxy3`
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/melpetera/intensity_checks/intens_check/1.2.8` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/melpetera/intensity_checks/intens_check/1.3.0`
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/lecorguille/xcms_fillpeaks/abims_xcms_fillPeaks/3.12.0+galaxy0` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/lecorguille/xcms_fillpeaks/abims_xcms_fillPeaks/3.12.0+galaxy3`
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/lecorguille/camera_annotate/abims_CAMERA_annotateDiffreport/2.2.6+camera1.48.0-galaxy1` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/lecorguille/camera_annotate/abims_CAMERA_annotateDiffreport/2.2.7+camera1.48.0-galaxy1`

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

## [1.0] - 2023-11-22

First release
diagram_svg:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1200 620" role="img" aria-label="LC-MS preprocessing with XCMS workflow diagram">
  <title>Mass Spectrometry: LC-MS Preprocessing with XCMS</title>
  <desc>LC-MS metabolomics preprocessing pipeline: data import, peak detection, grouping, retention time correction, second grouping, gap filling, CAMERA annotation, and quality checks.</desc>

  <defs>
    <pattern id="grid" width="20" height="20" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <path d="M 20 0 L 0 0 0 20" fill="none" stroke="#c5d5e4" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    <pattern id="grid-major" width="100" height="100" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="url(#grid)"/>
      <path d="M 100 0 L 0 0 0 100" fill="none" stroke="#b0c4d8" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>
    <style>
      .connection { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 4; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .connection-qc { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 5 3; }
      .connection-secondary { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .node-card { filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)); }
    </style>
  </defs>

  <rect width="1200" height="620" fill="#f8f9fa"/>
  <rect width="1200" height="620" fill="url(#grid-major)"/>

  <rect x="0" y="0" width="1200" height="45" fill="#25537b"/>
  <text x="20" y="28" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="16" font-weight="600" fill="white">Mass Spectrometry: LC-MS Preprocessing with XCMS</text>

  <!-- CONNECTIONS -->
  <!-- MS Dataset -> readMSData -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 180 150 C 220 150, 230 170, 270 170"/>
  <!-- readMSData -> findChromPeaks -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 470 170 C 500 170, 500 170, 530 170"/>
  <!-- readMSData -> Plot Chromatogram (QC) -->
  <path class="connection-qc" d="M 370 125 C 370 90, 350 80, 320 80"/>
  <!-- SampleMetadata -> Plot Chromatogram -->
  <path class="connection-qc" d="M 180 260 C 250 260, 250 95, 300 95"/>
  <!-- findChromPeaks -> Merger -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 730 170 C 760 170, 760 290, 270 290"/>
  <!-- SampleMetadata -> Merger -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 180 275 C 230 275, 240 305, 270 305"/>
  <!-- Merger -> groupChromPeaks 1 -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 470 295 C 500 295, 500 295, 530 295"/>
  <!-- groupChromPeaks 1 -> adjustRtime -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 730 295 C 770 295, 770 170, 810 170"/>
  <!-- adjustRtime -> groupChromPeaks 2 -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 1010 170 C 1040 170, 1040 295, 270 295"/>
  <!-- groupChromPeaks 2 -> fillChromPeaks -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 730 420 C 770 420, 770 420, 810 420"/>
  <!-- fillChromPeaks -> CAMERA annotate -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 1010 420 C 1040 420, 1040 420, 1070 420"/>
  <!-- adjustRtime -> Plot Chromatogram 2 (QC) -->
  <path class="connection-qc" d="M 910 125 C 910 100, 870 80, 830 80"/>
  <!-- Check Format -> Intensity Check (QC) -->
  <path class="connection-qc" d="M 730 460 C 770 460, 770 460, 810 460"/>

  <!-- INPUT NODES -->
  <!-- MS Dataset Collection -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(0, 110)">
    <rect width="180" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="180" height="14" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="90" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143" text-anchor="middle">MS Dataset Collection</text>
    <text x="90" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">LC-MS raw data</text>
    <text x="90" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">(mzML/mzXML)</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="45" r="6" fill="#ffd700" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- SampleMetadata -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(0, 230)">
    <rect width="180" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="180" height="14" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="90" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143" text-anchor="middle">SampleMetadata</text>
    <text x="90" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Sample groups &</text>
    <text x="90" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">class information</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="45" r="6" fill="#ffd700" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- PROCESSING NODES -->
  <!-- readMSData -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(270, 125)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">MSnbase readMSData</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Import raw MS</text>
    <text x="100" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">data to R objects</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- findChromPeaks -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(530, 125)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">xcms findChromPeaks</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">CentWave peak</text>
    <text x="100" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">detection</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Merger -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(270, 255)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">findChromPeaks Merger</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Merge peak lists</text>
    <text x="100" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">with metadata</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- groupChromPeaks 1 -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(530, 255)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">groupChromPeaks (1)</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Initial peak</text>
    <text x="100" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">correspondence</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- adjustRtime -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(810, 125)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">xcms adjustRtime</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Retention time</text>
    <text x="100" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">alignment (loess)</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- groupChromPeaks 2 -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(530, 380)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">groupChromPeaks (2)</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Final peak</text>
    <text x="100" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">correspondence</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- fillChromPeaks -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(810, 380)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">xcms fillChromPeaks</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Fill missing peaks</text>
    <text x="100" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">(gap filling)</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- CAMERA annotate -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(810, 255)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">CAMERA Annotate</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Isotope & adduct</text>
    <text x="100" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">annotation</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- QC NODES -->
  <!-- Chromatogram plots -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(200, 60)">
    <rect width="120" height="50" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="120" height="24" rx="4" fill="#10b981"/>
    <rect x="0" y="12" width="120" height="12" fill="#10b981"/>
    <text x="60" y="17" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Chromatograms</text>
    <text x="60" y="40" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">TIC & BPI plots</text>
    <circle cx="120" cy="25" r="6" fill="#10b981" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- RT correction plots -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(710, 60)">
    <rect width="120" height="50" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="120" height="24" rx="4" fill="#10b981"/>
    <rect x="0" y="12" width="120" height="12" fill="#10b981"/>
    <text x="60" y="17" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">RT Correction</text>
    <text x="60" y="40" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Before/after plots</text>
    <circle cx="120" cy="25" r="6" fill="#10b981" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- OUTPUT NODES -->
  <!-- Data Matrix -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(1070, 380)">
    <rect width="120" height="50" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="120" height="24" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="12" width="120" height="12" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="60" y="17" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Data Matrix</text>
    <text x="60" y="40" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Feature table</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="25" r="6" fill="#f97316" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Variable Metadata -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(1070, 260)">
    <rect width="120" height="50" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="120" height="24" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="12" width="120" height="12" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="60" y="17" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Annotations</text>
    <text x="60" y="40" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">CAMERA results</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="25" r="6" fill="#f97316" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- LEGEND -->
  <g transform="translate(20, 560)">
    <rect width="1160" height="45" rx="6" fill="white" fill-opacity="0.85" stroke="#dee2e6"/>
    <rect x="15" y="15" width="14" height="14" rx="3" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="35" y="26" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Input</text>
    <line x1="100" y1="22" x2="150" y2="22" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <text x="158" y="26" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Data flow</text>
    <line x1="260" y1="22" x2="310" y2="22" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-dasharray="5 3"/>
    <text x="318" y="26" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">QC / secondary</text>
    <rect x="440" y="15" width="14" height="14" rx="3" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="460" y="26" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Output</text>
    <rect x="530" y="15" width="14" height="14" rx="3" fill="#10b981"/>
    <text x="550" y="26" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Report / QC</text>
    <rect x="650" y="15" width="14" height="14" rx="3" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="670" y="26" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Processing</text>
  </g>
</svg>
